comments.body: Should we guard the change by `spark.driver.userClassPathFirst`?
It's already implied by ChildFirstURLClassLoader. Do you want to me check again in URLClassLoader?
Ohh okay I got what you mean.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +399,403 @@          childFirst.getURLs() ++ allJars(Utils.getSparkClassLoader)
        case urlClassLoader: URLClassLoader =>
          allJars(urlClassLoader.getParent) ++ urlClassLoader.getURLs
        case other => allJars(other.getParent)
      }

comments.body: I am 100% sure this change will 'guarantee' the class loading order. Because in `ChildFirstURLClassLoader`, we re-constructor it by setting the parent classloader to null and load classes with an order we explicitly set.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +399,403 @@          childFirst.getURLs() ++ allJars(Utils.getSparkClassLoader)
        case urlClassLoader: URLClassLoader =>
          allJars(urlClassLoader.getParent) ++ urlClassLoader.getURLs
        case other => allJars(other.getParent)
      }
